ComicInfo.Summary: Anger can fuel a man's destiny...or forever cloud it. Arthur must find his old mentor, Yoshi, if he is to save Princess Kiri's life. But his search will not be an easy one, for Yoshi is on a life-long quest to repair the legendary GEAR STATION. To find Yoshi, Arthur and his companions must first face the Kwan, an llegal underground fight club who's prize is a statue rumored to contain the mythical 23rd Gear! Can our heroes win the statue in mortal combat before the Rust Troopers catch up with them? Does the 23rd Gear even exist? Find out in the second installment of Dan Fraga's critically acclaimed THE GEAR STATION! A timeless tale seeped in the legend and lore of time's past with computer enhanced art straight from the future!
ComicInfo.Title: Call To Adventure
ComicInfo.Writer: Ford Lytle Gilmore,Dan Fraga,Janak Alford,Dan Fraga,Janak Alford,Ford Lytle Gilmore
